turn.0: ELI5: In Chemistry, why are they called the Noble Gases? I know they "don't share", but is that a crack at aristocrats or more of a Buddhist-style respectful reference to the nobility?
turn.1: We can’t economically create gold neither does gold play into market value anymore, we went over that.
